ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Soloing bards
ygData.msgSnippet: What would the mob be resisting?  The group was monk, cleric, bard.  I guess the MR resist would help keep chains stuck on the mob, but that seems wasteful.
ygData.messageBody:
What would the mob be resisting? The group was monk, cleric, bard. I guess
the MR resist would help keep chains stuck on the mob, but that seems
wasteful. The damage on Fufils is trival compared with the haste effect on
the monk (and also the bard). As for the dam shield, if there was more than
one mob awake, then the bard better be dealing with it.

A good bard looks at his (or her) group and figures what would best suit the
group. Perhaps even experimenting early on.


> I dont know if I would pick those songs (what level bard? depends on what
> choices were available) but they are not that far off base:
>
> Chains: good snare and atk slow down
>
> Fufil's not only does some targeted damage but it also reduces the mob's
MR
> (if anything, lead with Fufils so next thing sticks better.)
>
> Psalm of cooling: it gets awful hot and sweaty in Lower Guk and the damage
> shield also helps - especially if more than on mob is awake.
>
